Name: Home
story: You are at home lying down on bed
nav: Press 1 to go to living area, Press 2 to go to bathroom to get ready, Press 3 to leave directly

Name: Living area
story: You are in the living area, trying to decide whether to go to work, grocery shopping or go for the lecture in college
nav: Press 1 to go to bathroom, Press 2 to leave home, Press 3 to leave for bus stop

Name: Bathroom
story: You are in the bathroom where you have to decide if you wanna go to work, grocery shopping or college for your lecture
nav: Press 1 to go to Work, Press 2 to go to Super market, Press 3 to go to College

Name: Leave
story: You leave and you have to decide the mode of transportation for selected destination
nav: Press 1 to go to bus stop, Press 2 to go by cab, Press 3 to go by bicycle

Name: Bus stop
story: You wait for the Bus and catch the Bus for desired destination
nav: Press 1 to go to work, Press 2 to go to Super market, Press 3 to go to College

Name: Cab
story: You ask for a cab to your desired location
nav: Press 1 to go to work, Press 2 to go to Super market, Press 3 to go to College

Name: Bicycle
story: You ride bicycle to your desired location
nav: Press 1 to go to work, Press 2 to go to Super market, Press 3 to go to College

Name: Work place
story: You are working and you decide if you want to go grocery shopping after work
nav: Press 1 to go Home, Press 2 to go to supermarket, Press 3 to go to Gas station to buy energy drinks or smokes

Name: Super market
story: You do grocery shopping
nav: Press 1 to go to Dairy aisle, Press 2 to go to meat aisle, Press 3 to go to Vegetable aisle

Name: College
story: You are here to attend lecture
nav: Press 1 to go to classroom, Press 2 to go to Cafeteria, Press 3 to Library

Name: Dairy aisle
story: You are here to buy dairy products
nav: Press 1 to go to Meat aisle, Press 2 to go to Vegetable, Press 3 to go to Gas station

Name: Meat aisle
story: You are here to buy meat products
nav: Press 1 to go to Dairy aisle, Press 2 to go to vegetable aisle, Press 3 to go to Gas station

Name: Vegetable aisle
story: You are here to buy vegetables
nav: Press 1 to go to Dairy aisle, Press 2 to go to Meat aisle, Press 3 to go to Gas station

Name: Gas station
story: You are here to buy energy drinks and smokes
nav: Press 1 to go to Bus stop, Press 2 to go to Friends house, Press 3 to go to Tim hortons

Name: Class room
story: You attend the lecture here
nav: Press 1 to go to Cafeteria, Press 2 to go to library, Press 3 to go friends house

Name: Cafeteria
story: You chill here while in college
nav: Press 1 to go to classroom, Press 2 to go to Library, Press 3 to go friends house

Name: Library
story: You sit here to finish assignments
nav: Press 1 to go to classroom, Press 2 to go to cafeteria, Press 3 to go to friends house

Name: Friends house
story: You decide how to spend the evening
nav: Press 1 to go to Tim hortons, Press 2 to go for bowling, Press 3 to go to play pool

Name: Tim hortons
story: You order coffee and snacks here
nav: Press 1 to go to backyard, Press 2 to go to bowling, Press 3 to go for Campfire

Name: Bowling
story: You bowl here
nav: Press 1 to go to Restaurant, Press 2 to go to Campfire, Press 3 to go to Backyard

Name: Pool
story: You play pool here
nav: Press 1 to go to restaurant, Press 2 to go to Campfire, Press 3 to go to Backyard

Name: Restaurant
story: You have dinner here
nav: Press 1 to go to Campfire, Press 2 to go to Backyard, Press 3 to go to bedroom

Name: Campfire
story: You have a nice campfire
nav: Press 1 to go to backyard, Press 2 to go back home, Press 3 to go to bedroom
